item.description:
It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas!
Note: This is the second Thursday of the month, instead of our usual third!

December's meeting will be party time! You are cordially invited to come and socialize and swap books and other items. In the months of November and December, Email Renae with your list, and she will be compiling the master list and checking it twice (and then posting) of the books you have. Members should then choose what books they might want and then we'll all bring the books for the swap.
Optional: you are invited to (optional) bring some treat for the party.
We'll also be having prize drawings this month as well.
item.how_to_find_us: We will likely be in the Mara Auditorium or Room 106 in Webster Hall; the specifics will be posted the week of the meeting
item.name: December Manchester Adobe User Group
